description:
Made from recycled polyester and cotton, this practical vest will become an essential ally on your next adventure, even on hot days, thanks to the ventilated back lined with mesh fabric.

With its 3 cargo pockets, 2 handwarmer pockets, 2 inside pockets and a zippered chest pocket with a fly patch, you'll find all the space you need to go on adventures in an organized way.

An accessory loop is built in so you can hang any tools you need. Featuring a ribbed knit collar for easy layering with any garment.

However, don't be intimidated by the technical aspect of this piece. You don't have to be a skilled traveller to wear it. Originally designed for adventure utility mode, it can also be worn very well in lifestyle mode.
name: Hooke Travel Vest  - Mens
